entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
